completion_data.completion_summary: Restructured Zorn-based family construction with GH-only coherence. Eliminated base family impossibility (2 sorries) and Zorn type mismatch (used Preorder instance). 8 sorries remain in seed consistency and F/P recovery, but these are theoretically solvable unlike the original impossibility.
